channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2023091077
item.description:
Report X-2023091077

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded and placed on IC rollers on its side by package handler. When QA clerk found package, it was on its side with leakage at the top of the box. Package handler ignored orientation arrows. DescribePack: Plastic seals under caps burst which allowed contents to leak out of box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Proper package handler training on how to handle hazmats.
